mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.loan_typ AS "loan_typ", a.currency AS "currency", a.exchangerate AS "exchangerate", a.loan_prop AS "loan_prop", a.loan_amt AS "loan_amt", a.fix_amt AS "fix_amt", a.interest_count AS "interest_count", a.principal_rate AS "principal_rate", a.interest_rate AS "interest_rate", a.commit_rate AS "commit_rate", a.grace_period AS "grace_period", a.repay_period AS "repay_period", a.repay_type AS "repay_type", a.pk_fundssrc AS "fea_fundssrc.id"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fea_fundssrc_t( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, loan_typ, currency, exchangerate, loan_prop, loan_amt, fix_amt, interest_count, principal_rate, interest_rate, commit_rate, grace_period, repay_period, repay_type, pk_fundssrc ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{loan_typ}, #{currency}, #{exchangerate}, #{loan_prop}, #{loan_amt}, #{fix_amt}, #{interest_count}, #{principal_rate}, #{interest_rate}, #{commit_rate}, #{grace_period}, #{repay_period}, #{repay_type}, #{fea_fundssrc.id} )
